author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Macquarie Telecom Group ‍H1 NPAT $8.0 Mln, Up 29 Pct
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Macquarie Telecom Group Ltd:
* ‍H1 NET PROFIT AFTER TAX OF $8.0 MILLION, AN INCREASE OF 29%​
* ‍INTERIM DIVIDEND DECLARED OF 25 CPS, FULLY FRANKED​ * H1 REVENUE $114.9 MILLION, UP 8% * ‍FY18 DEPRECIATION IS EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN $23 MILLION AND $25 MILLION​
* ‍FY18 TOTAL CAPEX IS EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN $34 MILLION -$38 MILLION​
* ‍FULL YEAR FY18 EBITDA IS EXPECTED TO BE ABOUT $44 MILLION TO $46 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
